sect1.title: Troubleshooting Steam
sect1.para: It is recommended to just install the GLFS version of if on x86_64 instead of following this troubleshooting mini-guide. It is best practice now, and this guide down the line may become irrelevant, making an upmost requirement. If you absolutely do not want to recompile glibc with the "-mstackrealign" flag, and have not done so already, you may follow this mini-guide instead. None of this section is necessary if you already installed glibc with "-mstackrealign". You should not encounter any Steam issues out of the ordinary.
